Traction MR Elevators

High-performance, reliable, and energy-efficient elevator solutions for mid- to high-rise buildings with dedicated machine rooms.

Discover More

Overview

Our Traction Machine Room (MR) elevators are built for heavy-duty use, high-rise performance, and long-term reliability. With a dedicated machine room, they deliver smooth rides, advanced safety, and efficient operation for residential and commercial buildings.

Safety First

Enhanced with overspeed protection, robust braking systems, and emergency features for passenger security.

Heavy-Duty Performance

Larger motors and traction systems ensure high-capacity transport and consistent performance in tall structures.

Efficient & Reliable

Accessible machine-room setup enables optimized energy use, easier maintenance, and dependable long-term service.

The Reliable Traction Machine Room Elevator

EON Traction MR Elevators are engineered for high performance, heavy-duty applications, and seamless operation in mid to high-rise buildings. With a dedicated machine room, they ensure superior load capacity, smoother rides, and easier maintenance access. Designed for reliability and efficiency, they are the preferred choice for commercial towers, residential complexes, and premium projects.

  • Dedicated machine room for higher load handling and robust performance.
  • Supports both geared and gearless traction systems for flexible applications.
  • High-speed travel options up to 3.5 m/s — ideal for high-rise demands.
  • Overspeed governors and advanced braking systems for maximum safety.
  • Easy serviceability with accessible machine-room placement.
  • Long-term reliability with durable motors and proven traction technology.

Performance & Technology You Can Trust

EON Traction MR Elevators are built for heavy-duty use, higher capacities, and smooth vertical travel. With a dedicated machine room, they deliver robust performance, reliable operation, and simplified maintenance access — making them ideal for high-rise buildings and large-scale applications.

  • Dedicated machine room supports larger motors for higher load capacity.
  • High-speed travel up to 3.5 m/s for mid-rise and high-rise projects.
  • Stable, vibration-free rides designed for large-scale applications.
  • Overspeed governors and strong braking systems for enhanced safety.
  • Accessible machine room ensures easier service and maintenance.
  • Durable geared or gearless motors for long-term reliability.

Key Features

Heavy-Duty Capacity

Larger motors and traction systems handle higher loads with ease, ideal for commercial towers.

High-Speed Travel

Capable of speeds up to 3.5 m/s for efficient rides in mid-rise and high-rise projects.

Safety & Reliability

Overspeed governors and strong braking systems ensure maximum passenger safety.

Smooth Ride Comfort

Advanced traction systems deliver stable, low-vibration rides even under heavy use.

Easy Maintenance

Dedicated machine room gives technicians quick access, reducing downtime and service costs.

Long-Term Durability

Proven geared or gearless motors deliver consistent, long-lasting performance.

Smart Features

Advanced Monitoring

Real-time performance tracking and diagnostics from the machine room for maximum operational reliability.

Predictive Maintenance

Anticipates potential issues to reduce downtime and minimize repair costs.

Energy Efficiency

Optimized geared or gearless motors lower power consumption and operational expenses.

Secure Access

Controlled machine-room integration ensures safe and authorized elevator operation.

Customise Your Traction MR Elevator - At No Extra Cost

Traction MR Elevators can be tailored to match your building’s interiors, offering premium finishes as standard for a refined and professional look.

  • Walls: Glass, wood, stainless steel, or RAL panels to complement your interiors.
  • Floors: Carpet, vinyl, or bespoke designs for a personalized touch.
  • Ceilings: Sleek LED-lit panels with durable and stylish finishes.
  • Colours: Wide range of RAL shades to coordinate seamlessly with your décor.

Your elevator, your design – always included, never optional.

Multiple Layers of Safety In Every Ride

Traction MR Elevators are engineered with advanced safety systems to ensure maximum protection for passengers and smooth operation even in high-rise and heavy-duty applications.

  • Dual Emergency Brakes: Instantly halts the elevator in rare cases of mechanical or electrical failure.
  • Door Safety Sensors: Prevents movement until doors are fully closed and safe.
  • Power Backup: Maintains elevator operation during power outages.
  • Automatic Rescue Device (ARD): Safely lowers the cabin to the nearest floor in case of emergency.
  • GSM Connection: Ensures backup calling support for emergencies
  • Live SOS: Provides instant communication in emergencies so help is always available.

Technology Options

Traction

Quiet, smooth, and ideal for mid- to high-rise buildings with a dedicated machine room.

  • Powerful motor for higher loads
  • Easier maintenance via machine-room access
  • Reliable long-term performance
Hydraulic

Cost-efficient for low- to mid-rise buildings.

  • Simple setup and durable components
  • Handles heavy loads safely
  • Low maintenance

Technical Specifications at a Glance

Feature Specification
Drive System Gearless Traction
Speed Up to 2.5 m/s
Load Capacity 630 – 1000 kg
Max Stops Up to 16 Floors
Door Opening 800 – 1000 mm (Automatic Swing)
Pit Requirement 150 mm
Headroom 2800 mm
Cabin Size 1400 x 1400 mm (Std)
Emergency Backup Battery-operated ARD

The Elite Advantage: A Promise Beyond Just Our Product

Sustainability at Core

Built with energy-efficient gearless motors, regenerative drives, and LED lighting for a greener, high-performance ride.
